comment.author: 29079609@N02
comment._content: As the Germans were advancing, the French destroyed many bridges to try to slow them down. Plans were even prepared to destroy bridges in Paris, including Pont Nuef. This location is is the eastern suburbs of Paris and a key railway junction en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lagny-sur-Marne fr.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gare_de_Lagny_-_Thorigny
